Referenced by Op_Rot_VEFP1B::ajouter(), Op_Curl_VEFP1B::ajouter(), Terme_Source_Acceleration_VDF_Face::calculer_vitesse_faces(), Sonde::completer(), Postraitement::creer_champ_post(), Terme_Source_Qdm_lambdaup_VEF_Face::norme_H1(), Champ_P1NC::norme_H1(), Postraitement::postraiter_champs(), Op_Rot_VEFP1B::vecteur_normal(), Op_Diff_RotRot::vecteur_normal(), and Op_Curl_VEFP1B::vecteur_normal().

{
  Motcle motlu(le_nom_);
  const Nom& le_nom_ch = mon_champ.le_nom();
  if (motlu == Motcle(le_nom_ch))
    return -1;
  else
    {
      const Noms& noms_comp = mon_champ.noms_compo();
      int n = noms_comp.size();
      Motcles les_noms_comp(n);
      for (int i=0; i<n; i++)
        les_noms_comp[i] = noms_comp[i];
      int ncomp = les_noms_comp.search(motlu);
      if (ncomp == -1)
        {
          Cerr << "TRUST error, the Champ_Generique name : " << le_nom_ << finl
               << " is neither the field name nor"
               << " one of its components\n";
          Cerr << le_nom_ch << " have for components : " << finl;
          for (int ii=0; ii<n; ii++)
            Cerr << noms_comp[ii] << " ";
          Cerr << finl;
          Process::exit();
        }
      return ncomp;
    }

}

{
  nom_fichier+=".";
  const Entity& loc = op->get_localisation();
  Nom loc_post;

// contenu de la methode get_nom_localisation()
  if (loc==ELEMENT)
    loc_post = "ELEM";
  else if (loc==NODE)
    loc_post = "SOM";
  else if (loc==FACE)
    loc_post = "FACES";
  else
    {
      Cerr<<"This location is not valid for the postprocessing"<<finl;
